name: Original Toll House® Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. In small bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside.

In large mixer bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar and vanilla extract until creamy. Beat in eggs. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in semi-sweet chocolate morsels and nuts. Drop dough by rounded measuring tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake 9 to 11 minutes until edges are golden brown. Let stand on cookie sheets 2 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely.
Preheat oven to 375°F. Spread dough in greased 15½x10½x1-inch baking pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes. Cool completely. Cut into 2-inch squares.
